DOC.brief_title: Levobupivacaine Heart Rate Variability ( HRV ) Spinal Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: Obtain heart rate variability ( mean standard deviation , include high frequency , low frequency ratio ) data spinal anesthesia ECG ( Heart Rate Variability Analyzer ) 2 group . Meanwhile , record blood pressure subject .
DOC.criteria: Indicated spinal anesthesia Allergic reaction local anesthetic Coagulopathy Severe spinal deformity Cardiac diseases Metabolic disease ( DM , thyroid adrenal disease )
